titleStmt.title: Fuimus Troes Æneid. 2. The true Troianes, being a story of the Britaines valour at the Romanes first inuasion: Publikely represented by the gentlemen students of Magdalen Colledge in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Fisher, Jasper, b. 1591.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] L[egatt] for Robert Allot, and are to be sold at the signe of the Beare in Pauls-Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
